channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 中国最高领导层承诺实现今年的经济目标，避免风险并保持社会稳定，这凸显了对受长期房地产危机和通货紧缩影响的经济复苏的担忧。
item.description:
China’s top leadership has pledged to meet economic targets for the year, avoid risks and maintain social stability, underscoring concern for a recovery hampered by a prolonged property crisis and deflation https://t.co/tKNrLsERww

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 一名英国对冲基金交易员承认在震惊丹麦的大规模税务丑闻中帮助丹麦骗取约 12 亿美元的指控
item.description:
A British hedge fund trader pleads guilty to allegations he helped swindle Denmark out of about $1.2 billion in a massive tax scandal that rocked the country https://t.co/yRU4vjsb0f

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 新的美国现货比特币交易所交易基金在不到两个月的时间里吸引了超过 70 亿美元的资金流入，正在撼动最古老的加密货币市场。
item.description:
New US spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds are shaking up the market for the oldest cryptocurrency after attracting more than $7 billion in inflows in less than two months https://t.co/teFtF1mbAb

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 泰国计划在全国范围内部署 30 架飞机进行播云作业，诱发人工降雨，以消除空气污染，缓解主要农作物种植区的干燥天气状况。
item.description:
Thailand plans to deploy 30 aircraft nationwide for cloud-seeding operations to induce artificial rain to battle air pollution and ease dry weather conditions in the main crop-growing areas https://t.co/TKIiCY4v8B

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 东欧最大的贷款机构 Erste 表示，在经济产出放缓和房地产市场逆风的情况下，预计风险准备金将增加
item.description:
Erste, the largest lender in eastern Europe, says it expects risk provisions to rise amid a slowdown in economic output and property market headwinds https://t.co/5khAHCqYDB

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 美国制裁措施的加强削弱了印度与俄罗斯的石油贸易，迫使加工商考虑其他供应方式
item.description:
Tightening enforcement of US sanctions is denting India’s oil trade with Russia, forcing processors to consider other supplies https://t.co/NsOu49f2FZ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 德国 2 月份失业人数增加了 1.1 万人，是分析师预测的 5000 人的两倍多。
item.description:
Joblessness in Germany rose by 11,000 in February — more than double the 5,000 predicted by analyst https://t.co/nhbxxhGVGB

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 津巴布韦通货膨胀率创六个月新高，市场正焦急地等待新的措施来重振岌岌可危的本币状况
item.description:
Zimbabwe’s inflation rate hits a six month high as the market anxiously waits for new measures to revamp the foundering local currency https://t.co/TpzT12ndgV

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 随着全球对人工智能相关技术的需求激增，台湾预计今年经济将从 2023 年的低迷状态迅速反弹
item.description:
Taiwan projects its economy will rebound swiftly this year from a lackluster 2023 as surging global demand for artificial intelligence-related technologies fuels growth https://t.co/Uox7GKYozg

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 周四是 PCE 日。以下是美联储最青睐的通胀指标的真正制作过程
item.description:
Thursday is PCE Day. Here's what really goes into making the Fed's favorite measure of inflation https://t.co/hmZMbzA59q

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 挪威王室表示，挪威国王哈拉尔五世将在马来西亚的一家医院再住几天，因为他的感染情况有所好转
item.description:
Norway’s King Harald V will remain at a Malaysian hospital for a few more days as his health improves from an infection, the Royal House of Norway says https://t.co/Irz0Ipgh4M

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 预计到 2024 年，印度的太阳能和风能部署将跃升 30% 以上，但这一速度仍不足以实现其在本十年末达到 500 千兆瓦的清洁能源目标。
item.description:
India’s solar and wind deployment is forecast to jump more than 30% in 2024, a pace still not fast enough to meet its clean energy goal of 500 gigawatts by the end of this decade https://t.co/Ug0DoqDObh

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 来玩彭博预算游戏🎲大选在即，首相希望您减税以赢得选民。但您能避免市场崩溃吗？免费游戏，无付费墙 1/
item.description:
🎲Come play the Bloomberg Budget game 🎲
An election is looming and the prime minister wants you to deliver tax cuts to win over voters. But can you avoid crashing the markets? Free to play, no paywall 1/https://t.co/tTodJF0dtc

— Joe Mayes (@Joe_Mayes) February 29, 2024

item.title: 被投资者视为沙特王国雄心勃勃的增长计划代表的沙特银行股表现优于摩根大通，目前有望在美联储降息的情况下获得提振
item.description:
A Saudi bank stock viewed by investors as a proxy for the kingdom’s ambitious growth plans has outperformed JPMorgan and is now poised for a boost in the event of Fed rate cuts https://t.co/9FSU5D3aUk

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 在周五举行的伊朗议会选举中，投票率将成为比选举结果本身更重要的衡量标准
item.description:
Turnout is set to be a more important metric than the results themselves in Iran's parliament election on Friday https://t.co/jKNGL6oxn3

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 世贸组织部长级会议进入预定的最后一天，从电子商务关税到渔业补贴等关键问题仍在谈判之中，最有可能取得的结果是喜忧参半
item.description:
The WTO’s ministerial meeting reaches its final scheduled day with key issues ranging from e-commerce tariffs to fishing subsidies still under negotiation and mixed results as the likeliest outcome https://t.co/Y4Z9wiwQia

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 哈利法塔背后的开发商将斥资 960 亿迪拉姆（约合 210 亿美元）在该市建造两个豪华社区
item.description:
The developer behind the Burj Khalifa skyscraper is spending 96 billion dirhams ($21 billion) to build two luxury neighborhoods in the city https://t.co/WiVd7IzQ2v

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 瑞士经济意外保持增长势头，制造业继续拖累经济
item.description:
Swiss growth unexpectedly maintains momentum, even as manufacturing continued to weigh on the economy https://t.co/v0QH1evHdR

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 据当地一家广播公司报道，台湾军方发生数据泄露事件，这是这个民主管理的岛国网络安全面临的最新挑战
item.description:
Taiwan’s military suffered a data leak, according to a local broadcaster, the latest challenge to the democratically run island’s cybersecurity https://t.co/OiUFxYEOZq

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 施罗德报告 2023 年管理资产增长，尽管市场波动和汇率变动影响了利润
item.description:
Schroders reports a growth in its assets under management for 2023 even as volatile markets and currency moves weighed on profit https://t.co/QiCeutvtVK

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 一场关于马来西亚最富有的家族之一如何创造财富的争斗在半个地球之外的瑞士法庭接近尾声。对于拥有超过 2 万亿美元全球财富的瑞士来说，这一判决可能是一个重要的决定。
item.description:
A fight over how one of Malaysia's richest families made its wealth is nearing its end half a world away in a Swiss court.

The verdict may be an important decision for Switzerland, home to more than $2 trillion of global fortunes https://t.co/AfMDmAZn1b

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 去年，餐厅、商店和酒吧新开业数量激增，推高了伦敦旅游热点地区的租金，使房东沙夫茨伯里公司（Shaftesbury）受益匪浅。
item.description:
A surge of new restaurant, shop and bar openings helped push rents in London’s tourist hot spots higher last year, boosting landlord Shaftesbury https://t.co/Yqx1V2xI7U

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: Grifols 的利润大幅增长 27%，在做空机构指控其欺诈行为导致公司价值缩水数十亿欧元后，该公司将重心重新转移到了陷入困境的医疗保健公司的发展前景上。
item.description:
Grifols's profit jumps 27%, shifting the focus back to the embattled healthcare company’s growth prospects after a short-seller’s allegations of fraud wiped billions of euros off its value https://t.co/JoLpddqhKe

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 瑞典去年最后一个季度的产出意外萎缩，打破了北欧最大经济体摆脱短暂衰退的说法
item.description:
Sweden’s output unexpectedly contracted in the final quarter of last year, upending a narrative in which the biggest Nordic economy had escaped a short-lived recession https://t.co/ehCkacey4v

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: Man Group 的客户一年多来首次从全球最大的上市对冲基金公司撤资
item.description:
Man Group’s clients pulled funds from the world’s biggest publicly listed hedge fund firm for the first quarter in over a year https://t.co/HI61iYaLcz

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 英国股票看起来很便宜，金边债券的收益率超过 4%，优质公司债券的收益率超过 5%，英镑看起来会走强。英镑资产提供了一个低压力的避风港，@marcusashworth 写道（通过 @观点）
item.description:
UK stocks look cheap, gilts offer yields of more than 4%, high-quality corporate bonds are available at more than 5% and the pound looks set to strengthen. Sterling assets offer a low-stress haven, @marcusashworth writes (via @opinion) https://t.co/XYTOK5y6rS

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 土耳其 1.1 万亿美元的经济增长速度远超预期，避免了在央行大规模加息的两个季度中出现经济萎缩的情况
item.description:
Turkey’s $1.1 trillion economy grows much faster than forecast, avoiding a contraction during a two-quarter stretch when the central bank delivered the bulk of its massive interest-rate hikes https://t.co/iA4OxOnUe5

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 国泰航空旗下廉价航空公司香港快运因面临新飞机交付延迟的前景，"小部分 "机票暂缓发售
item.description:
Cathay Pacific’s budget carrier HK Express is holding back “a small percentage” of tickets from sale as it deals with the prospect of new plane delivery delays https://t.co/VaBFYVAoWn

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 据说索尼已经撤回了将其印度业务与 Zee Entertainment 合并的协议，从而迈出了废除一项长达两年之久的计划的最后一步，该计划旨在创建一个价值 100 亿美元的媒体巨头。
item.description:
Sony is said to have withdrawn the agreement to merge its India operations with Zee Entertainment, taking the final step in scrapping a two-year-old plan that sought to create a $10 billion media giant https://t.co/vFriXWBFYg

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024
